title: San Juan Island Community Foundation Open Position Announcement: Director of Finance | Sponsored content | The Journal of the San Juan Islands - Journal of the San Juan Islands
content: San Juan Island Community Foundation Open Position Announcement: Director of Finance | Sponsored content | The Journal of the San Juan Islands  Journal of the San Juan Islands
description: The Foundation is seeking an accountant to be responsible for all financial, accounting and fund management functions of the Foundation. This senior executive position will join an expert team assuring the successful execution of the Foundationâ€™s charitable community mission. This job has been updated to a full-time position.
